name: Pluto Data Analytics
slogan: Data-driven sports analysis, real-time probability forecasts and betting insights
description: We are building a scalable, real-time sports analysis product, pulling in data from live feeds and generating accurate probability forecasts through machine learning. We are focused on creating a flexible software platform that enables our data scientists and sports analysts to move from idea to productionised model as quickly as possible, allowing us to drive value in an ever-changing market. We have the expertise and backing of industry veterans, and the groundwork required to build a world-class technical team and product.

team.title: Tech Advisor
team.name: James Gin
team.bioHtml: Experienced R&D manager building the team at Pluto Data Analytics

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description:
### About Us
Pluto Data Analytics is an early-stage sports analysis and betting consultancy, backed by industry veterans. We are building a multi-sport analysis platform, producing real-time probability forecasts for in-play events using machine learning. Our focus is on creating a robust and automated machine learning environment which empowers our data scientists and sports analysts to move from idea to productionised models as quickly as possible.

### Our Tech Stack
We use technologies to support the standard python machine learning stack, served in the cloud, with modern front-ends. 
* Back-end: Python - ML stack e.g. numpy, tensorflow, scikit-learn, API (Flask, FastAPI)
* JavaScript (React 16, NightWatch);
* AWS hosting environment, serverless (Lambda)
* 
### About You
You have:
* A degree in a relevant subject or equivalent commercial experience;
* 5+ years engineering experience, including Python and at least one other language;
* A self-starting attitude and leadership skills, the ability to work under remote direction
* Experience leading development practices in software teams;
* An excellent grasp of full-stack software development, from front-end engineering skills to cloud-based containerised hosting environments, taking in RDBMS and NoSQL data storage and RESTful API design.
* Commercial experience leading technical architecture design and discussion, developing creative solutions to a wide range of technical problems.
* Plenty of experience working with and implementing continuous integration and delivery processes;
* The desire to build rock-solid software by using TDD, code reviews, Git;

**In addition, it would be desirable if you have:**
* A love of or interest in sports, particularly cricket and football
* Experience with machine learning software, data engineering and ETL
* A strong mathematical background
* Working knowledge of security best practices

At Plutodata, you’ll be:

* One of the first hires in a growing technical team working to operationalise and scale a winning sports model
* Building a robust testing environment to enable rapid data science model development
* Working with traders to develop a web-based front-end for in-play sports trading
* Working directly with the technical lead to make large scale architecture and design decisions
* Helping to define operational best practices for the development team as it’s built
* Contributing to hiring decisions
* Participating as a key member of a small team, supporting your colleagues, leading when necessary and always breaking new ground.

### A bit about our team

Plutodata is offering an exciting opportunity to be one of the first team members of a funded sports trading environment, with unique compensation options.
